title: Biohazard 3 Last Escape
alternative_title: Resident Evil 3 Last Escape ; Resident Evil 3 Nemesis
status: Resident Evil 3 Last Escape ; Resident Evil 3 Nemesis
description:
Description :
        Biohazard 3: Last Escape is a series of Hong Kong manhua (Chinese-language comics) written as a tie-in to Resident Evil 3: Nemesis. It was published by SkyWalker Comics.
